user.title: Connect to OpenClaw Gateway
user.description: Configure connection to your OpenClaw Gateway

pairing.title: Device Approval Required
pairing.description:
A new device has been registered with your OpenClaw Gateway and needs to be approved before it can connect.

Please approve it in the OpenClaw CLI or Control UI, then click Submit to continue.

If your OpenClaw instance is on the same machine (localhost), this should be approved automatically.

session.title: Session and Speech
session.description: Choose a session and speech options

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate OpenClaw Gateway
reauth_confirm.description: The gateway token is no longer valid. Please update your connection settings.

error.pairing_not_approved: Device not yet approved in OpenClaw. Approve it, then try again.
error.pairing_required: Device approval required. Approve this device in OpenClaw, then retry.

gateway_auth_failed.title: Gateway authentication failed
gateway_auth_failed.description: The OpenClaw Gateway token is no longer valid. Update your token in Settings > Devices & Services > OpenClaw > Configure.

device_pairing_required.title: Device approval required
device_pairing_required.description: This Home Assistant device needs to be approved in OpenClaw before it can connect. Approve it using the OpenClaw CLI or Control UI, then reload the integration.
